title: Inadvertent Neolinguistics
content:
[[module CSS]]

.wiki-content-table tbody tr th {
    color: #ffffff;
    background-color: #8B5E8C;
    border: 1px solid #000000;
}
table.wiki-content-table td {
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
    color: #000000;
}
#header {
  background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/inadvertent-neolinguistics/Ontotop.png)
}

/*
 * The rest is stolen shamelessly from notgull's Siege of Site-19
 */

@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=PT+Serif&display=swap");@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Mono&display=swap");div.irc-log{margin:10px;margin-top:20px;padding:10px;border:3px solid #000000;background-color:#333333;border-radius:15px;font-family:"IBM Plex Mono",monospace;color:#FFFFFF;font-size: 125%;}div.irc-log td{border:1px solid #000000;font-weight:bold}div.irc-log p{line-height:200%}div.irc-log span.userred{font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:1px;background-color:#ffabab;color:#050505;padding-left:2px;border:1px solid #ffabab;margin-right:.25em}div.irc-log span.userwhite{font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:1px;background-color:#ffffff;color:#050505;padding-left:2px;border:0px solid #ffabab;margin-right:.25em}div.irc-log span.userblue{font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:1px;background-color:#abcdff;color:#050505;padding-left:2px;border:1px solid #abcdff;margin-right:.25em}div.irc-log span.useryellow{font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:1px;background-color:#fffcb2;color:#050505;padding-left:2px;border:1px solid #fffcb2;margin-right:.25em}div.irc-log span.usergreen{font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:1px;background-color:#afffb1;color:#050505;padding-left:2px;border:1px solid #afffb1;margin-right:.25em}div.irc-log::before{content:"SCiPNET Messaging System";position:relative;top:-1.5em;left:-1.5em;border:2px solid #050505;color:#050505;background-color:#5effa6;font-family:"PT Serif",serif;padding:1px 3px;border-radius:3px;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:2px}div.inventory-report{margin:10px;margin-top:20px;padding:10px;border:2px solid #050505;background-color:#eee;border-radius:3px}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
div#header h1 a span {
    font-size: 0px;
}
div#header h1 a:before {
    content: "Site-120";
    color: #eee;
    
}
div#header h2 span {
    font-size:0px;
    padding: 4px;
}
div#header h2:after {
    content: "Fighting Fire With Fire";
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #f0f0c0;
    padding: 19px 0;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .8);
    white-space: pre;
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[=]]
**"Inadvertent Neolinguistics"**
It's all fun and games until somebody dradf4tgrfd gfa4egdfgdsd.

Written by [[*user HarryBlank]] with the monstrous typos provided by [[*user Ralliston]] and [[*user JakdragonX]]


**[[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/this-page-intentionally-left-blank|More by HarryBlank!]]]**

**[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ralliston-s-authorpage More by Ralliston!]**

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/jakdragonx-rage-collection More by JakdragonX!]**

[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[div class="irc-log"]]
||**{{Site-119/Site-120 Interlink}}**||
[[span class="userblue"]]**M_Kaufmann_120:**[[/span]] I can beat that. Okay, so, you know how I said [[span class="userwhite"]][http://www.scpwiki.com/ralliston-s-authorpage Dr. Asheworth][[/span]] dictates all his notes to his PDA? Using the voice recognition thing? Well, it has //no idea// what he's talking about half the time. Maybe it's a glitch in the software, or maybe it's his accent, or him just saying the wrong word entirely sometimes, but the results are just //hilarious//.

[[span class="userblue"]]**M_Kaufmann_120:**[[/span]] Please find attached the Department of Ontokinetics collaborative **Asheworth-to-English Dictionary**.

[[span class="userwhite"]][http://www.scpwiki.com/jakdragonx-rage-collection Dr. Reigen][[/span]] sometimes sends messages to the notification system using his phone, and early in the morning or late at night that shit is //not pretty.// Check out our **Reigen-to-English Dictionary** while I read yours.

[[span class="userblue"]]**M_Kaufmann_120:**[[/span]] Oh my good lord, that's a thing of beauty!

[[span class="userblue"]]**M_Kaufmann_120:**[[/span]] Wait, I just remembered! Asheworth sent this to the Ontokinetics groupchat the other day:

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-source= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-user= --]
|user-id=ralliston
|username=Dir. Asheworth
|usericon=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/harry-blank-3/Ralliston.png
|usercolor=#CA56ED
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-start= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-start= --]
|user-id=ralliston
|username=Dir. Asheworth
|msg-time=2/22/21
]]
I pod ye s a pTawtatxbabdbtird to the t meimestwlt throwbii of to go
[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-msg-end= --] ]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:discord-chat-source |inc-end= --] ]]

[[span class="usergreen"]]**K_Phillips_119:**[[/span]] Wow, that's like... a skill-testing question, or something.

[[span class="userred"]]**D_Asheworth_120:**[[/span]] You gentlemen are aware that your messages were sent to the full listservs for Site-119 and Site-120, yes?

[[span class="userblue"]]**M_Kaufmann_120:**[[/span]] uh

[[span class="useryellow"]]**J_Reigen_119:**[[/span]] Hahaha wow, Asheworth, "Pissing Angela"?

[[span class="userred"]]**D_Asheworth_120:**[[/span]] You're one to talk, Mr. proal;blebl!

[[span class="useryellow"]]**J_Reigen_119:**[[/span]] I DISPUTE THAT ONE

[[span class="userred"]]**D_Asheworth_120:**[[/span]] I DISPUTE THEM ALL
[[/div]]
